name: Starveling Way
description:
Starveling Way is a tactical turn-based game set in a zombie apocalypse
You need to get to the exit, overcoming wastelands with obstacles, bypassing crowds of zombies, and collecting supplies to survive.
You have a supply of food and moving through the cells on the field you spend one unit of food to move through one cell. Also on the field there are various obstacles and zombies which you need to avoid and collect supplies for the further journey. When the food supply runs out or you are caught by a zombie, the game will be over.
